mdRecord.dcterms:creator: La RouÃ«rie, Charles Armand Tuffin, marquis de, 1751-1793
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Wrote to Mr. Ferdinand Grand about paying the interest that is due; Grand claimed to have received no instructions from the United States board of treasury; requests that Jefferson give Grand the order to pay the interest; if the interest is not paid, there will be consequences for France and the United States; the interest is due on the first day of every year; will be terribly upset if Grand does not pay.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1788 December 26, "au chateau de la Rouerie, par fourgeres en Bretagne, [France], to T[homas] Jefferson, [Paris, France].
